itemDescription: Irish rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Simon Easterby (born 21 July 1975 in Harrogate, North Yorkshire) is an Irish former rugby union player. He is currently the defence coach for the Irish national team.

link_mentions.page: 2005 British & Irish Lions tour to New Zealand
response: * Simon Easterby (Llanelli Scarlets and Ireland) – added 4 June for Lawrence Dallaglio

O'Connell joined the Ireland national men's team coaching setup as the new forwards coach in January 2021, replacing his former international teammate Simon Easterby, who changed roles within the setup to become the defence coach.
